---
description: Commit specified changes to the repository.
---
 
Could you please create a commit with the specified changes? If the user has provided further details about the commit message or files to include, make sure to incorporate that information into the commit. follow the commit message guidelines provided in the repository.

You should give the user 2 or more options for the number of commits to create based on the changes made. For example, if there are multiple distinct features or fixes, suggest creating separate commits for each. If the changes are minor or closely related, suggest a single commit.

Let the user choose which option they prefer before proceeding with the commit.
